S04n392:2: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S04n392:5: bhagavānāha- asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā |
S04n392:7: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n392:9: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma-asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ |
S04n392:10: ye cānye'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotavyam ||
S04n392:11: atha te'surāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā avalokiteśvarasyāntikamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti sma |
S04n392:12: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājamabhimukhīkurvanti,
S04n392:29: te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti-mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra,
S04n392:32: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam,
S04n392:35: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma |
S04n392:37: athe ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ ||
